> <OLD>
>
> Nightshift nods and trots after Prowl.
>
> " Yes Sir.  I'm on it.  Maan I sure hope we're the only ones in here."

<NEW>

The trip to the communications section was swift.

They passed through the door, then through a much larger room which
looked to be some sort of clearing house for information and
databanks. Consoles and monitors lines the walls as well work centers
spaced through out the room. The only problem is that certain sections
looked as if they had taken heavy damage. Parts had been ripped away,
torn apart and generally mauled. There was no general rhyme or reason
to, it just looked like general chaos.

There was no power in this room and all the lights were off. The only
lights were from what NIGHTSHIFT and PROWL were shining.

There was a lift positioned in the center of the room, its doors
having claw marks on it as well. It also was shut off.

On the far side of the room was where the communications was located,
through the door that POLAR CLAW had instructed.

The communications room looked to be in a lot better shape. The walls
were lined with various panels and stations desinged with the idea of
analyzing communications and detecting even encrypted data.

It geneally looked whole, very little damage had been done here.

PROWL looked around and nodded, "So, how much do you know about
circuit board repair?"

(TAG)

- Preston
